metaTags.metaDescription: Filter, inspect, and isolate Internet traffic with Cloudflare's Secure Web Gateway (SWG). Block ransomware, phishing, and other malware. Discover how.

promotionalBanner.desktopText: What is a Secure Web Gateway (SWG) and what does it do? Read more in our Learning Center.

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare Gateway
relatedBlades.subtitle: Internet-native Secure Web Gateway (SWG)
relatedBlades.copy:
- Defend against ransomware, phishing, and other threats for faster, safer Internet browsing
- Reduce cyber risk by tapping into Cloudflare's massive Internet traffic visibility and threat intelligence pool
- Build custom HTTP, DNS, and network filtering policies across remote and office users
relatedBlades.leftLink: [Try it out today and get started with our Free plan!](https://dash.cloudflare.com/sign-up/teams)

features.title: Accelerate Internet access
features.description: Improve team productivity by enforcing security closer to end users. No more backhauling user requests to centralized scrubbing centers for inspections.

features.title: Block threats, known and unknown
features.description: Reduce cyber risk by blocking access to known bad, risky, or unwanted destinations identified via Cloudflare's unique visibility across Internet traffic.

features.title: Monitor traffic across your network
features.description: Improve tech efficiency by stacking in-line [Zero Trust services](https://www.cloudflare.com/learning/security/glossary/what-is-zero-trust/) and providing holistic visiblity into your Internet traffic across users, devices, and locations.

features.title: Cloudflare is the only new vendor in the 2023 GartnerÂ® Magic Quadrantâ„¢ for Security Service Edge (SSE)
features.description: Cloudflare has been recognized in the 2023 GartnerÂ® Magic Quadrantâ„¢ for Security Service Edge (SSE) report. We believe our recognition validates our commitment to continue advancing our Zero Trust platform to help secure hybrid work.

imageAssetFile.title: Gartner Logo narrow aspect ratio with space

features.title: Cloudflare named a Strong Performer in "The Forrester Waveâ„¢: Zero Trust Platforms, Q3 2023
features.description: Cloudflare cites continued disruptive momentum in the SSE market, receiving the highest scores possible, 5.0/5.0, in the innovation, roadmap, pricing flexibility & transparency, and hybrid workforce enablement & protection criteria.

imageAssetFile.title: Forrester Logo narrow aspect ratio with space

features.title: Cloudflare named a "Leader" in 2023 KuppingerCole Leadership Compass for SASE
features.description: Through its 2023 SASE market analysis, KuppingerCole Analysts AG cited several Cloudflare strengths such as our large globally distributed presence and sophisticated traffic acceleration, massive backbone capacity, 100% uptime guarantee, and innovative Remote Browser Isolation.

imageAssetFile.title: KuppingerCole Logo narrow aspect ratio with space

relatedBlades.title: Top use cases for Gateway
relatedBlades.copy:
- __Protect against phishing and ransomware__ - Thwart attacks with proactive filtering and inspection policies across comprehensive security categories.
- __Secure distributed remote offices__ - Protect office users first with DNS filtering and later, more comprehensive inspections across all locations.
- __Upgrade struggling SWG hardware__ - Send L4-L7 traffic through Cloudflare's global network and replace legacy appliances that fail to scale.

relatedBlades.title: Threat protection features across full Zero Trust platform

plan.name: Free Plan
plan.description: Essential security controls to keep employees and apps protected online. Best for teams under 50 users, or proof-of-concept tests.

plan.entryTitle: Zero Trust Q4 - Pay as you go
plan.name: Pay-as-you-go
plan.description: Protects access to anything on your network and the Internet. Best for teams over 50 users that do not require enterprise support services.

plan.name: Contract Plan
plan.description: Best for organizations that want security transformation backed by maximum support, visibility, connectivity and interoperability.

relatedBlades.title: Tackle Zero Trust one step at a time

buttonOne.elementName: Talk to an Expert zero trust enablement button

buttonTwo.elementName: Compare All Plans zero trust enablement btn

features.title: Easy setup and management
features.description: Streamline policy building and auditing security or compliance incidents with predefined security, content, and application-based categories.

features.title: Massive threat intelligence
features.description: Leverage the power of Cloudflare's DNS and HTTP telemetry and threat detection models to help stay protected from even emerging threats.

features.title: Faster, better end user experience
features.description: Cloudflare's single-pass inspection is [>50% faster](https://blog.cloudflare.com/network-performance-update-cio-edition/) than other SWG alternatives. Faster, unintrusive protection without any performance tradeoffs.

relatedBlades.title: How it works
relatedBlades.copy:
- Securely route traffic from individual devices or branch routers to Cloudflare
- Inspect traffic against massive threat intelligence and customized filtering
- Apply other in-line services like [data loss prevention](https://www.cloudflare.com/products/zero-trust/dlp/) or [remote browser isolation](https://www.cloudflare.com/products/zero-trust/browser-isolation/) for additional controls to protect your organization's exposure to the open Internet

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare Zero Trust - Secure Web Gateway
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare Zero Trust - Secure Web Gateway

relatedBlades.quote: "Algolia is growing pretty fast. We needed a way to have visibility across our corporate network without slowing things down for our employees. Gateway gave us a simple way to do that."

quoteCarousel.quote: "Our whole team is remote, working from home offices. We don't have a server room with hardware firewall appliances, and it wouldn't really make sense to have one. So I'm always looking for ways to keep our team more secure and harden their connections, wherever they are."

"We were an early customer of Cloudflare Gateway. At Storytel we needed an easy way to protect our network and devices from security threats and anomalies. With Gateway, we were able to do just that in less than five minutes."
